alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:29PM CDT until April 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Little Yazoo, or 12 miles south of Yazoo City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Myrleville around 535 PM CDT. Benton around 545 PM CDT. Vaughan around 600 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
